item.title: Weird NumberFormatException When Using SimpleDateFormat
item.description: The SimpleDateFormat from JDK is not thread-safe, so be careful when it is used in a concurrent environment. Although it is clearly stated in the JavaDoc of the API that itâ€™s not synchronized, I think many would not notice it until we encounter problems caused by the issue.
